descriptions.app_name: Who Typed It First? Speed Game
descriptions.app_description: A fun competitive game that detects when multiple users type the same message and announces who was first.

key_features: Detects duplicate messages in a Telex channel.
Announces who typed the message first.
Supports configurable settings for time windows.

settings.label: Time Window for Duplicate Detection (seconds)
settings.description: Set the time (in seconds) within which duplicate messages must be detected.

settings.label: Enable Leaderboard
settings.description: Enable leaderboard tracking for fastest users.

settings.label: Leaderboard Reset Frequency
settings.description: Choose how often the leaderboard should reset.

settings.label: Notification Format
settings.description: Choose the format of the speed game notifications.
